IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_mails') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_mails GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_mails @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT id, sender_nickname, sender_id, sender_npc_code, title, body, sent_at, is_read, game_money, mail_type FROM dbo.Mails WHERE character_id = @character_id
SELECT mail_id, id, item_code, item_count FROM dbo.Mail_Inventories WHERE character_id = @character_id
SELECT mail_id, item_id, socket_count, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Mail_Equip_Item_Infos WHERE character_id = @character_id
SELECT mail_id, item_id, socket_slot_id, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Mail_Equip_Item_Scoket_Infos WHERE character_id = @character_id
SELECT mail_id, item_id, option_script_1, option_value_1, option_script_2, option_value_2, option_script_3, option_value_3 FROM dbo.Mail_Accessory_Item_Infos WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_mails') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_mails GO
